skins.selfIntroduction: Hmph! I'm Deutschland, the first ship of the Deutschland-class! A prestigious individual such as myself wouldn't be sent into smaller battles. As such, it's only natural that I don't have many of these petty achievements. It's called spiritual leadership! Hmph! Lützow? ...Shut up! Like I'd care about that!
skins.acquisition: From now on, you are Deutschland's servant! You should feel honored. Also, don't answer me with "mhm." You will answer me with "yes, ma'am" from now on. Are we clear?
skins.login: You sure took your sweet time. Just where were you rooting around?
skins.details: It's times like these... where I simply must punish you.
skins.secretaryIdle1: It seems like I must speak in a way that even lowly animals can understand.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hahaha! I didn't even need to fire my gun to scare off those cruisers~
skins.secretaryIdle3: If you insist on standing around like an idiot, I'm just going to leave.
skins.secretaryTouch: You just never learn, do you? Do you want to taste my whip again that badly~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hmm? It seems like you're enjoying yourself... do you get off to this kind of stuff?

skins.shipDescription: For such a lowly animal, your taste is not bad... That's right, I am Deutschland, Demon Princess of the Iron Blood and Mistress of the Night! Plebeians, no, my slaves, I shall grant you an opportunity to swear fealty to me with a kiss!
skins.acquisition: For such a lowly animal, your taste is not bad... That's right, I am Deutschland, Demon Princess of the Iron Blood and Mistress of the Night! Plebeians, no, my slaves, I shall grant you an opportunity to swear fealty to me with a kiss!
skins.details: Slave, come here... Do not fear, these little bats won't hurt you.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Imbecile! I only wore this costume as a hobby. Who gave you permission to serve me such a repulsive beverage?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Slave, help me get off my throne. Shorty? You imbecilic swine, do you think this is funny?
skins.secretaryTouch: Slave, offer your neck to me so that I may feed... Ahahaha! Imbecile, surely you didn't take me seriously!

skins.shipDescription: One must not neglect sunscreen during the summer... Plebeian, if you wish to serve your master, prostrate yourself and yell "I beg of you, Queen Deutschland" three times, and I might consider giving you an opportunity. Ahahaha~
skins.acquisition: One must not neglect sunscreen during the summer... Plebeian, if you wish to serve your master, prostrate yourself and yell "I beg of you, Queen Deutschland" three times, and I might consider giving you an opportunity. Ahahaha~
skins.login: Way! Too! Slow! Are you trying to get my pristine skin sunburnt?
skins.details: Lazy swine, don't cut corners. Anything less than a perfectly uniform application of sunscreen is unacceptable!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Plebeian, fetch those two towels over there and wipe my body dry.
skins.secretaryIdle2: If your eyes wander any lower, they will get detached from their sockets. I say, there is no remedy for being uncultured swine~
skins.secretaryIdle3: A lifebuoy? What would I use that for? Plebeian, were you not going to carry me on your back while swimming?
skins.secretaryTouch: To think that a plebeian would look at me with such a hungry, bestial expression. A lewd beast like this needs a thorough flogging.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ho ho, it looks like this lowly swine cannot even control its basest desires.

skins.shipDescription: I seem pleased? Of course I am. Why wouldn't I be when my sweet little sister will be joining us at the party? Now shape up and entertain your master, you lowly animal! Ahahahaha!
skins.acquisition: I seem pleased? Of course I am. Why wouldn't I be when my sweet little sister will be joining us at the party? Now shape up and entertain your master, you lowly animal! Ahahahaha!
skins.login: Still sluggish as always. But because I'm in a pretty decent mood today, I'll forgive you!
skins.details: What belongs to my lowly animal also belongs to me. Therefore, the stronger my lowly animal's fleet is, the clearer the proof of my excellence is.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Lowly animal, you may offer your opinion about me and Graf Spee's dresses. Hmph, I bet your vocabulary doesn't include anything beyond "cute," ahahaha!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ehh? Graf Spee is actually talking to people from other factions...? I hope she's not being bullied... I'll have to give them a stern warning just in case...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Tell me, lowly animal, why does everyone greet me instead of cowering in fear? ...Because they like me? R-really... Hmph. As a spiritual leader, it's only natural to be respected by all!
skins.secretaryTouch: Dancing? Aha~ I just knew you'd come to me with this request, so I prac... err, prepared beforehand!

skins.shipDescription: Why are so many people out and about during a holiday? ...That's it! Lowly animal, was it your idea to prepare all this to surprise me...?! Heh... Hehe, that's right, don't you dare disappoint me!
skins.acquisition: Why are so many people out and about during a holiday? ...That's it! Lowly animal, was it your idea to prepare all this to surprise me...?! Heh... Hehe, that's right, don't you dare disappoint me!
skins.login: There you are, lowly animal. Now help me take off these heels! Strolling around in these things is so tiresome...
skins.details: The decor in here is truly sumptuous... Hahahah! It further raises the pedestal of eminence atop which I sit! Isn't that right, lowly animal? Ahahahaha!
skins.secretaryIdle1: If Spee wasn't so dear to me, I would've never even *considered* building a snowman!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Oh lowly animal, your master is hungry. I've heard that the Dragon Empery's cuisine is very delectable... You know what to do now, yes? Ahahahahah!
skins.secretaryIdle3: So much noise... Oh lowly animal, go outside and check what happened!
skins.secretaryTouch: Are you trying to touch my stole? I have no memory of granting a lowly animal permission to do that!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hahah, do you yearn for my punishment that badly, lowly animal?
